title: Cosmic Queries – Alien Worlds and Extremophiles with Kennda Lynch
description:
What will life be like on other planets? On this episode, Neil deGrasse Tyson and comic co-host Chuck Nice explore the origins of life on alien planets and extremophiles right here on Earth with astrobiologist Kennda Lynch. 

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/show/alien-worlds-and-extremophiles-with-kennda-lynch/

Thanks to our Patrons Alex Chadwick, Eric Gross, Tamara Michael, Gerald Johnson, Jordan Shelley, Brendan Barbieri, David Bell, Costa Cad Creations, Tim Costella, and Adam Baker for supporting us this week.

Photo Credit: Sharanbhurke, CC BY-SA 4.0 , via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Chuck Nice, Kennda Lynch)
